attributes.action: Ban The Trade Of Polar Bear Fur From All Countries Including Internet Trade Of Any Animal Fur
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the certain extinction of Polar Bears and all beautiful, innocent, endangered species, we need a complete worldwide ban on the Trade of Polar Bear Fur from all countries including Internet Trade of any Animal Fur and Animals being traded over the internet.
If an Act isn't created to stop this barbaric trade by the UK government and all countries, then you can guarantee that Polar Bears along with other endangered species, will become extinct due to humans greed in the fur trade and other endangered species parts.
The rights of all Animals including endangered species should be safeguarded rather than exploited.
